Ashokjhar Waterfall, Sukinda

Visited on December 6th,2019
Waterfall

Ashokjhar is a tourist place situated in Sukinda Block .It is about 8 KM from Block Head Quarter.Nearest Railway Station is Sukinda Road.Nearest Air Port Bhubaneswar 100 km From sukinda.


Although it is a small waterfall compared to others, the natural beauty of this place give surprises to all the visitors. Its located approximately 122kms from Bhubaneswar. You can visit the Mahavinayak temple nearby ashokjhar. There are two sites where you can view the waterfall. The first one is around 200 meters while the second one is around 1Km. The steepness and narrow trekking paths make the second site unaccessible. A goot spot for picnic,there's a spacious ground for that. A good site overall.
